samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: A simple calendar component for JavaScript (TypeScript) to select dates easily by switching between month, year, and decade views with a rich user interface

samples.name: Disabled Dates
samples.description: Calendar widget for JavaScript (TypeScript) with disabled dates to restrict users from selecting a defined set of dates

samples.name: Date Range
samples.description: Calendar for JavaScript (TypeScript) with min and max dates that restrict users from selecting dates outside a defined range, like weekends, etc

samples.name: Special Dates
samples.description: Calendar for TypeScript that highlights multiple dates like weekends, holidays, events, or a range of days with options to add custom styles and descriptions

samples.name: Multi Selection
samples.description: A simple and lightweight calendar component for JavaScript (TypeScript) that features multiple date selection to allow users to select more than one date
